alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher; Lincoln; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 11:11PM CDT until August 14 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Northern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Southern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Logan County in central Oklahoma... Payne County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1111 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marshall to near Ripley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Guthrie, Cushing, Perry, Perkins, Stroud, Hennessey, Langston, Crescent, Waukomis, Yale, Cashion, Carney, Glencoe, Tryon, Ripley, Agra, Coyle, Cedar Valley, and Marshall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Garfield; Kingfisher; Lincoln; Logan; Noble; Payne
